name: PowerAppsSolutionSettingsTransform
description: Transform the JSON settings file generated by PowerApps CLI,
author: Aidan Cole

inputs.name: settings_file_path
inputs.label: Settings File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown:
### Settings File Path

Specify the path to the JSON settings file generated by PowerApps CLI for transformation.

inputs.name: fail_on_warning
inputs.label: Fail On Warning
inputs.helpMarkDown:
### Fail On Warning

Specify whether to fail if any warnings occur.

- Set to `true` to fail this task if a variable does not exist in the pipeline.
- Set to `false` to only receive warnings for this.

Failing this task will help catch problems with your deployment settings before trying to import the solution into a new environment. Default value is `false`.
